get.description:
List all suppliers that are currently integrating with Procurement, but are not yet available to connect. You can display them in a preview section, so users know what's to come.
- needed bearer: `Organization`

List all suppliers that are currently integrating with Procurement, but are not yet available to connect. You can display them in a preview section, so users know what's to come.
- needed bearer: `Person`

List all suppliers that are currently available to you.Will return already connected suppliers as well as those ready to be connected by you.
- needed bearer: `Organization`
- needed scopes: `procurement_consumer.article_base.r` or `procurement_consumer.article_base.rw`

List the specific supplier that is available to you.Will return already connected suppliers as well as those ready to be connected by you.
- needed bearer: `Organization`
- needed scopes: `procurement_consumer.article_base.r` or `procurement_consumer.article_base.rw`

List all suppliers that are currently available to you.Will return already connected suppliers as well as those ready to be connected by you.
- needed bearer: `Person`
- needed scopes: `procurement_consumer.article_base.r` or `procurement_consumer.article_base.rw`

List the specific supplier that is available to you.Will return already connected suppliers as well as those ready to be connected by you.
- needed bearer: `Person`
- needed scopes: `procurement_consumer.article_base.r` or `procurement_consumer.article_base.rw`

List all sites belonging to your organization. These are required as part of the ordering process. Please be aware that only sites with valid addresses will be returned as only those can be used for ordering. In order to create or update sites, incl. adding valid addresses, please use the Zaikio Hub (either via API or via the website).
- needed bearer: `Organization`

List all sites belonging to your organization. These are required as part of the ordering process. Please be aware that only sites with valid addresses will be returned as only those can be used for ordering. In order to create or update sites, incl. adding valid addresses, please use the Zaikio Hub (either via API or via the website).
- needed bearer: `Person`

List your orders. Excludes drafts orders, unless they were created by the same app.
- needed bearer: `Organization`
- needed scopes: `procurement_consumer.orders.r` or `procurement_consumer.orders.rw`

get.description:
List all your pending or declined contract requests.
Contract requests are required to establish a contract with a supplier on the procurement platform. Without
a contract no products of the supplier can be found or purchased.

- needed bearer: `Organization`
- needed scopes: `procurement_consumer.contracts.r` or `procurement_consumer.contracts.rw`

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Filter contract requests by state

get.description:
Lists the specific pending or declined contract request
- needed bearer: `Organization`
- needed scopes: `procurement_consumer.contracts.r` or `procurement_consumer.contracts.rw`

patch.description:
Updates the contract request. Pending and declined requests can be updated, if updating a declined request it will be re-submitted
- needed bearer: `Organization`
- needed scopes: `procurement_consumer.contracts.w` or `procurement_consumer.contracts.rw`

delete.description:
Deletes the contract request. Only pending contract requests can be deleted.
- needed bearer: `Organization`
- needed scopes: `procurement_consumer.contracts.w` or `procurement_consumer.contracts.rw`

post.description:
Creates a new contract request for the given supplier.
The supplier can afterwards accept or decline your contract request.
Contract requests are required to establish a contract with a supplier on the procurement platform. Without
a contract no products of the supplier can be found or purchased.

- needed bearer: `Organization`
- needed scopes: `procurement_consumer.contracts.w` or `procurement_consumer.contracts.rw`

get.description:
List all your material requirements. Will not return archived material requirements.
- needed bearer: `Organization`
- needed scopes: `procurement_consumer.material_requirements.r` or `procurement_consumer.material_requirements.rw`

parameters.name: filter[article_category]
parameters.description: Filter results to only include those with a material of the chosed article category

parameters.name: filter[creator_id]
parameters.description: Filter results to only include those that have been created by the provided Zaikio person

parameters.name: filter[purchaser_id]
parameters.description: Filter results to only include those that have been purchased by the provided Zaikio person

parameters.name: filter[state]
parameters.description: Filter results to only include those that are in the provided state

parameters.name: filter[site_id]
parameters.description: Filter results to only include those that have their site_id set to the provided site id

parameters.name: filter[supplier_id]
parameters.description: Filter results to only include those of the chosen supplier

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search query to filter material requirements by. The search matches materials, categories, suppliers, purchasers and all provided job related data.

parameters.name: sorting
parameters.description: Sorts the results by the given sort option

patch.description:
Refreshes the order conditions (price, stock and delivery date) of the given material requirement.
For suppliers that do not support live inquiries, it will just recalculate the price with the information
Procurement has stored.
For suppliers that support live inquiries, it will create a new inquiry to fetch the latest conditions if
they are outdated.

- needed bearer: `Organization`
- needed scopes: `procurement_consumer.material_requirements.w` or `procurement_consumer.material_requirements.rw`

get.description:
Returns the specific variant
- needed bearer: `Organization`
- needed scopes: `procurement_consumer.article_base.r` or `procurement_consumer.article_base.rw`

Search throughout all variants that are avilable to your organization. In order to search you need to provide the type parameter as well as either a search query or any kind of filter. Please be aware that this endpoint returns multiple different variant schemas in it's response, so depending on the chosen type(s) the returned result key might differ.
- needed bearer: `Organization`
- needed scopes: `procurement_consumer.article_base.r` or `procurement_consumer.article_base.rw`

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Filter search results by specific product types. You can either pass a single value or a comma separated list of types, e.g. `type=substrate,plate`. Use `all` to include all available Variant types in the response. The usable types are: envelope, ink, laminating_foil, offset_printing_blanket, plate, ring_binding, sheet_substrate, sleeking_foil, web_substrate

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Query string to search variants by

results.summary: PS1 - Premium Coated, 880 × 630 mm, 90 g/㎡, short
PS1 - Premium Coated, 920 × 650 mm, 115 g/㎡, short

get.description:
Returns the specific variant
- needed bearer: `Person`
- needed scopes: `procurement_consumer.article_base.r` or `procurement_consumer.article_base.rw`

Search throughout all variants that are avilable to your organization. In order to search you need to provide the type parameter as well as either a search query or any kind of filter. Please be aware that this endpoint returns multiple different variant schemas in it's response, so depending on the chosen type(s) the returned result key might differ.
- needed bearer: `Person`
- needed scopes: `procurement_consumer.article_base.r` or `procurement_consumer.article_base.rw`

parameters.name: type

Use `all` to include all available Variant types in the response. The usable types are: envelope, ink, laminating_foil, offset_printing_blanket, plate, ring_binding, sheet_substrate, sleeking_foil, web_substrate

parameters.name: query

article.description: The brightest ink on the planet
article.name: SuperShine Cyan™
article.summary: Printicolor® – SuperShine Cyan™ – The brightest ink on the planet – CMYK/Cyan (offset)

article.description: The brightest ink on the planet

article.summary: Printicolor® – SuperShine Magenta™ – The brightest ink on the planet – CMYK/Magenta (offset)

slug.title: Slug
slug.description: Human readable, normalized and unique identifier of the Supplier organization. The slug may be used within Procurement (and other Zaikio Apps) as part of URLs to uniquely identify resources for this organization.

connected.title: Connected
connected.description: Boolean flag that indicates whether the consumer making this request is connected to this supplier or not.

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: The currency that will be used when ordering at this supplier. This value will be null if you are not connected to the supplier.

customer_number.title: Customer number
customer_number.description: Your customer number for this supplier. This value will be null if you are not connected to the supplier and can still be null even if you are connected.

prices_updated_at.title: Prices updated at
prices_updated_at.description: The most recent time that the Supplier reported updated prices for your organization. This value may be null as we don't require suppliers to provide this information. Please note that many suppliers already support on-the-fly pricing inquiries, so periodic bulk updates are unnecessary for them. For those suppliers this value will also be null. You can use this value to represent the freshness of prices in your UI, if you do so, please cross-check with the supplier capabilities and inform the user when the supplier supports on-the-fly pricing, which makes displaying this date obsolete.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the pricing agreement.

article_types.title: Article types
article_types.description: The types of article that the Supplier intends to offer to everybody, which can be shown to the customer to help them decide whether to connect with the Supplier. Please note that the Supplier may not actually have any articles of these types available to you after connecting, as new article types are added here first before then becoming available in the platform.

automatically_accept_contract_requests.title: Automatically accept contract requests
automatically_accept_contract_requests.description: If true the supplier will automatically accept any contract request immediately and provide instant access to their articles. If false every consumer will have to go through a vetting process during which the supplier actively approves a contract. Please note that the event succession is unaffected by this, so in both cases you will receive an event for created contract requests as well as created contracts.

brand_color.title: Brand color
brand_color.description: Primary brand colour in hex colour format

cancelation_policy.title: Cancelation policy
cancelation_policy.description: The cancelation policy of the supplier. If 'always' you will always be allowed to request order cancelations. If 'before_production' you will be able to request order cancelations as long as they are not yet in production. If 'before_shipment' you will be able to request order cancelations as long as it has not been shipped. If 'never' you will not be able to request order cancelations.

logo_url.title: Logo url
logo_url.description: A URL pointing to a SVG, JPG or PNG image of the supplier's logo

minimum_days_before_delivery.title: Minimum days before delivery
minimum_days_before_delivery.description: The minimum amount of days one need to order before the actual delivery date to have the order shipped in time. If this value is set to 2 and you want to order today, the earliest possible delivery date will be in 2 days from now. If the value is null, there is no restriction.

maximum_days_until_delivery.title: Maximum days until delivery
maximum_days_until_delivery.description: The maximum amount of days that a delivery date can be scheduled in advance. If this value is 15 and you want to order goods with a delivery date in 30 days, that you will need to wait for another 15 days to place that order. If the value is null, there is no restriction.

supports_split_delivery.title: Supports split delivery
supports_split_delivery.description: If true the supplier allows to split one order into multiple deliveries. If false the supplier requires all order items to have the same delivery.

maximum_order_size.title: Maximum order size
maximum_order_size.description: The maximum number of line items that can be added to a single order of this supplier. If null, no limit applies

references.title: References
references.description: This field can be used to add additional internal references to the material requirement, such as an internal process number. We will not share any added references with the Supplier. By default it will include an Zaikio identifier for the material requirement as the first element.

state.title: State
state.description: The current state of the material requirement. If the state is `draft` it means that the material requirement can still be modified and has not yet been ordered. If the state is `ordered` it means that the material requirement has been ordered and is awaiting confirmations by the supplier. If the state is `confirmed` it means that the order including this material requirement has been confirmed by the supplier and is now in progress. This also means that you will now be able to see the final order conditions on the attached order. If the state is `fulfilled` it means that the order including this material requirement has been successfully delivered. If the state is `canceled` it means that the order including this material requirement has been canceled by either you or the supplier.

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: The desired amount in the selected unit

description.title: Description
description.description: Description of the required material. This field will be automatically filled once a variant has been selected and includes a human description for the chosen variant.
description.example: MAGNO NATURAL – PS1 - Premium Coated, 880 × 630 mm, 80 g/㎡, short

environmental_certification.title: Environmental certification
environmental_certification.description: The environmental certification of the material. NOTE: This field only applies to substrate based products

unit.title: Unit
unit.description: The unit that the required material should be ordered in

sku_preference_ids.title: SKU preference ids
sku_preference_ids.description: A list of SKU ids that have been set as a preference. SKU preferences can be use to restrict the ordering to certain known packagings (e.g. if you want to order reamed paper only, you will need to add available reamed sku ids here). Available SKU ids for a given material can be retrieved by requesting the variants resource. If the array is empty it means that Procurement will consider all available SKUs for the given material when optimizing order amounts. If the array includes any value, Procurement will only cosider the returned SKUs when optimizing order amounts.

material_required_at.title: Material required at
material_required_at.description: Date when you would like the material requirement to be delivered

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: Currency to be used for prices of the required material. The currency will be automatically inferred by the selected supplier.

price.title: Price
price.description: The best known net price of the required material. Please note that a price can only be determined if all of the required fields are filled. Required fields include: variant, amount, unit, site. Please also note that if all required fields are filled and the price is still `null` that means that we were not able to determine a valid price for the required material and it will thus not be orderable.

fees.title: Fees
fees.description: Any additional fees that apply when ordering this material requirement individually. These might include shipping fees or low volume surcharges. Please note that fees will always return `null` if the price is also `null`.

accuracy.title: Accuracy
accuracy.description: The accuracy for the provided price information. If the accuracy is `estimated` it means that the price is determined solely by the data stored by us which has previously been provided by the supplier. This data might not reflect the final :ord price and can deviate slightly when ordering (e.g. due to extra charges). If the accuracy is `in_verification` it means that the currently provided price is estimated, but we're currently reaching out to the supplier to retrieve verified prices. This process may take multiple minutes. If the accuracy is `verified` it means that the provided price has been directly provided by the supplier and should match the final order price. If the accuracy is `outdated` it means that the provided price has previously been directly provided by the supplier, but has since expired. It can not be guaranteed that this price is still valid and refreshing the price is advised.

verified_at.title: Verified at
verified_at.description: Date and time at which the pricing information has been verified

delivery_date.title: Delivery date
delivery_date.description: The expected date of delivery. If this field returns `null` it means that Procurement was not able to determine an expected delivery date. If the material requirement has been ordered this value will always be the confirmed delivery date of the order.

in_stock.title: In stock
in_stock.description: Boolean flag indicating whether or not the required material is in stock at the supplier. If this field returns `null` it means that Procurement was not able to retrieve stock information.

accuracy.title: Accuracy
accuracy.description: The accuracy for the provided availability information information. If the accuracy is `estimated` it means that all availability properties are determined solely by the data stored by us which has previously been provided by the supplier. This data might not reflect the final values when ordering the material requirement. If the accuracy is `in_verification` it means that the currently provided values are estimated, but we're currently reaching out to the supplier to retrieve verified availability information. This process may take multiple minutes. If the accuracy is `verified` it means that the provided availability information has been directly provided by the supplier and should match the final order conditions. If the accuracy is `outdated` it means that the provided avaialbility information has previously been directly provided by the supplier, but has since expired. It can not be guaruanteed that the values are still valid.

verified_at.title: Verified at
verified_at.description: Date and time at which the availability information has been verified

order_quantity_in_base_unit.title: Order quantity in base unit
order_quantity_in_base_unit.description: The calculated quantity that can be ordered in the the base unit of the variant. Please be aware that this value can be higher than your requested amount if the required material has a minimum order volume.

order_quantity_in_requested_unit.title: Order quantity in requested unit
order_quantity_in_requested_unit.description: The calculated quantity that can be ordered in the provided `unit`. Please be aware that this value can be higher than your requested amount if the required material has a minimum order volume.

anticipated_costs.title: Anticipated costs
anticipated_costs.description: The estimated costs for the material requirement

client.title: Client
client.description: Client of the job that the material is required for

description.title: Description
description.description: Description of the job that the material requirement is required for
description.example: Required paper for the Zaikio journal

link.title: Link
link.description: A URL pointing to the job in an external system

reference.title: Reference
reference.description: Reference number of the job that the material requirement is required for

creator.title: Creator
creator.description: Person who created the material requirement

visible_in_web.title: Visible in web
visible_in_web.description: Boolean flag indicating whether this material requirement will appear on the Zaikio Procurement Website or not. Please note that newly created material requirements will not be visible by default.

ordered_at.title: Ordered at
ordered_at.description: Date at which the material requirement has been ordered

fulfilled_at.title: Fulfilled at
fulfilled_at.description: Date at which the order for the material requirement has been fulfilled.

canceled_at.title: Canceled at
canceled_at.description: Date at which the order for the material requirement has been canceled.

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: The desired amount in the selected unit

anticipated_costs.title: Anticipated costs
anticipated_costs.description: The estimated costs for the material requirement

environmental_certification.title: Environmental certification
environmental_certification.description: The environmental certification of the material. NOTE: This field only applies to substrate based products

job_client.title: Job client
job_client.description: Client of the job that the material is required for

job_description.title: Job description
job_description.description: Description of the job that the material requirement is required for

job_link.title: Job link
job_link.description: A URL pointing to the job in an external system

job_reference.title: Job reference
job_reference.description: Reference number of the job that the material requirement is required for

material_required_at.title: Material required at
material_required_at.description: Date when you would like the material requirement to be delivered

site_id.title: Site
site_id.description: ID of the site that the material should be delivered to

sku_preference_ids.title: SKU preference ids
sku_preference_ids.description: A list of SKU ids that have been set as a preference. SKU preferences can be use to restrict the ordering to certain known packagings (e.g. if you want to order reamed paper only, you will need to add available reamed sku ids here). Available SKU ids for a given material can be retrieved by requesting the variants resource. If the array is empty it means that Procurement will consider all available SKUs for the given material when optimizing order amounts. If the array includes any value, Procurement will only cosider the returned SKUs when optimizing order amounts.

supplier_id.title: Supplier
supplier_id.description: ID of the supplier that you want to order the given variant from. This field is only required when you order a variant that can be supplied by multiple suppliers.

unit.title: Unit
unit.description: The unit that the required material should be ordered in

variant_id.title: Variant
variant_id.description: ID of the variant that is the required material

references.title: References
references.description: This field can be used to add additional internal references to the material requirement, such as an internal process number. We will not share any added references with the Supplier. By default it will include an Zaikio identifier for the material requirement as the first element.

visible_in_web.title: Visible in web
visible_in_web.description: Boolean flag indicating whether this material requirement will appear on the Zaikio Procurement Website or not. Please note that newly created material requirements will not be visible by default.

SKU preferences can be use to restrict the ordering to certain known packagings (e.g. if you want to order reamed paper only, you will need to add available reamed sku ids here). Available SKU ids for a given material can be retrieved by requesting the variants resource. If the array is empty it means that Procurement will consider all available SKUs for the given material when optimizing order amounts. If the array includes any value, Procurement will only cosider the returned SKUs when optimizing order amounts.

supplier_id.description: ID of the supplier that you want to order the given variant from. This field is only required when you order a variant that can be supplied by multiple suppliers.

references.description: This field can be used to add additional internal references to the material requirement, such as an internal process number. We will not share any added references with the Supplier. By default it will include an Zaikio identifier for the material requirement as the first element.

visible_in_web.title: Visible in web
visible_in_web.description: Boolean flag indicating whether this material requirement will appear on the Zaikio Procurement Website or not. Please note that newly created material requirements will not be visible by default.

customer_number.title: Customer number
customer_number.description: Your customer number at the Supplier

contact_first_name.title: Contact first name
contact_first_name.description:
The first name of a contact person that the Supplier can reach out to for further questions
regarding the contract request.

contact_last_name.title: Contact last name
contact_last_name.description:
The last name of a contact person that the Supplier can reach out to for further questions
regarding the contract request.

contact_email.title: Contact email
contact_email.description:
The email address of a contact person that the Supplier can reach out to for further questions
regarding the contract request.

contact_phone.title: Contact phone
contact_phone.description:
The phone number of a contact person that the Supplier can reach out to for further questions
regarding the contract request.

declined_at.title: Declined at
declined_at.description:
The date and time at which the Supplier declined the contract request.
This field will only be filled if the supplier declined the contract request.

declined_reason.title: Declined reason
declined_reason.description:
A reason provided by the supplier as to why the contract request has been declined.
This field will only be filled if the supplier declined the contract request. Please be aware that we
don't enforce suppliers to provide a reason when declining.

references.title: References
references.description:
This field can be used to add additional internal references to the contract request, such as an
internal process number. We will not share any added references with the Supplier.
By default it will include an Zaikio identifier for the contract request as the first element.

state.title: State
state.description:
The current state of the contract request.
If the state is `accepted` it means that the contract request was already accepted and converted
into a `Contract`.
If the state is `pending` it means that the supplier is still reviewing the contract request.
If the state is `declined` it means that the supplier declined the contract request and you will
not be able to order at this supplier. If you have further questions regarding the state of a contract
request, please reach out to the supplier.

customer_number.title: Customer number
customer_number.description: Your customer number at the Supplier

contact_first_name.title: Contact first name
contact_first_name.description:
The first name of a contact person that the Supplier can reach out to for further questions
regarding the contract request.

contact_last_name.title: Contact last name
contact_last_name.description:
The last name of a contact person that the Supplier can reach out to for further questions
regarding the contract request.

regarding the contract request.

regarding the contract request.

dimensions_unit.title: Dimensions unit
dimensions_unit.description: The unit used for dimensions (width, height, thickness)

thickness.title: Thickness
thickness.description: Thickness of the blanket in dimensions_unit

width.title: Width
width.description: The width of the blanket in dimensions_unit

height.title: Height
height.description: The height of the blanket in dimensions_unit

brightness.title: Brightness
brightness.description: The brightness of the substrate as a percentage (values may be >100 for substrates with OBA added)

category.title: Category
category.description: The product category of the substrate

color.title: Color
color.description: The color of the substrates surface

core_diameter.title: Core diameter
core_diameter.description: Diameter of the core of the roll of substrate

dimensions_unit.title: Dimensions unit
dimensions_unit.description: The unit used for dimensions (width / height) of the variant

length.title: Length
length.description: The length of the substrate in the variants dimensions_unit

optical_brightness_agent.title: Optical brightness agent
optical_brightness_agent.description: Flag indicating presence of Optical Brightness Agent (OBA)

optical_brightness_agent_amount.title: Optical brightness agent amount
optical_brightness_agent_amount.description: Amount of the optical brightness agent, measured in delta-b (dB)

paper_weight_unit.title: Paper weight unit
paper_weight_unit.description: The unit in which the paper weight is defined

paper_weight.title: Paper weight
paper_weight.description: Paper weight of the substrate specified as grams per square meter (gsm) or lb (basis weight) depending on the paper_weight_unit.

roughness.title: Roughness
roughness.description: The roughness of the substrate in mL/min

thickness.title: Thickness
thickness.description: Thickness of the substrate in micrometer (metric)

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: The transparency of the substrate as a percentage

whiteness.title: Whiteness
whiteness.description: The whiteness of the substrate as a percentage (values may be >100 for substrates with OBA added)

width.title: Width
width.description: The width of the substrate in the variants dimensions_unit

applications.title: Applications
applications.description: The possible applications for this blanket, one or several

color.title: Color
color.description: The color of the blanket material

compressible_layer.title: Compressible layer
compressible_layer.description: The structure of the compressible layer

fabric_layers.title: Fabric layers
fabric_layers.description: The number of layers (e.g. fabric layer, compressible layer and rubber layer = 3)

hardness.title: Hardness
hardness.description: The estimated hardness of the surface in Shore A, see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shore_durometer

ink_compatibility.title: Ink compatibility
ink_compatibility.description: The compatibility with ink for this blanket, one or several

rubber_composition.title: Rubber composition
rubber_composition.description: The kind of rubber that is used

surface_roughness.title: Surface roughness
surface_roughness.description: The estimated roughness of the surface Ra in micrometers, see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Surface_roughness

headquarter.title: Headquarter
headquarter.description: If this is true the respective site is marked as the headquarter for the organization. Every organization has exactly one headquarter.

certifications.title: Certifications
certifications.description: A list of certifications for this particular substrate

classification_reports.title: Classification reports
classification_reports.description: A list of reference reports, which could be related to the certifications

coated.title: Coated
coated.description: Describes the sides on which the paper is coated

finish.title: Finish
finish.description: The type of surface finish of the substrate

kind.title: Kind
kind.description: The kind of the printable substrate

surface.title: Surface
surface.description: The surface texture of the foil

custom_flavor.title: Custom flavor
custom_flavor.description: If this variant represents a special colour formula for a specific customer (i.e. Pantone Red for Coca-Cola) this attribute contains the name of this flavour (i.e. Coco-Cola). If the variant represents a generic formula this attribute must be left empty.

supported_substrate.title: Supported substrate
supported_substrate.description: The kind of substrate on which one can print with this ink. In offset settings for example some ink formulas can be used on coated paper while other can be used on uncoated paper. If there is no difference in which substrates can be printed on the value `universal` must be selected here.

width.title: Width
width.description: The width of the roll in dimensions unit

length.title: Length
length.description: The length of the roll in dimensions unit

thickness.title: Thickness
thickness.description: The thickness of the roll in dimensions unit

diameter.title: Diameter
diameter.description: The core diameter of the roll

dimensions_unit.title: Dimensions unit
dimensions_unit.description: The unit used for the measurements of the variant. Defaults to mm

headquarter.title: Headquarter
headquarter.description: If this is true the respective site is marked as the headquarter for the organization. Every organization has exactly one headquarter.

addition.title: Addition
addition.description: Additional information to the address. Commonly used to add further delivery instruction, e.g. whom to hand the delivery to.

country_code.title: Country code
country_code.description: The country code of the address

location.title: Location
location.description: Array composed of the latitude and longitude of the address

number.title: Number
number.description: The number of the address. Can refer to houses, streets or areas.

zip_code.title: Zip code
zip_code.description: The zip code of the address

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: The precise identifier of this ink's colour for the colour system selected in `system`. If the system `CMYK` is selected, this identifier must be one of: Cyan, Magenta, Yellow, Black (please note the capitalisation). If `Pantone`/`HKS` are selected this represents the Pantone/HKS colour name or number.

printing_technique.title: Printing technique
printing_technique.description: The printing technolgies with which this ink can be used.

system.title: System
system.description: The colour system in which this ink is represented. The value in `identifier` describes the exact name of the ink in the colour system selected here. If the ink is a standard scale colour, the system `CMYK` must be selected.

size.title: Size
size.description: Common description of the envelope size, one of the following international standards: ISO216, DIN678, US commercial, as well as the values `square` and `custom` (if the envelope size is not recognised by us). If absent, we'll try to calculate the size using the provided width/height.

substrate_weight.title: Substrate weight
substrate_weight.description: The substrate weight (i.e. grammage) of the envelope

substrate_weight_unit.title: Substrate weight unit
substrate_weight_unit.description: The unit of the substrate weight, defaults to gsm

width.title: Width
width.description: The length of the (horizontal) top edge, parallel to the flap and window, in dimensions_unit (mm)

height.title: Height
height.description: The length of the (vertical) left edge, perpendicular to the flap and window, in dimensions_unit (mm)

orientation.title: Orientation
orientation.description: Whether the width (top edge) is longer (landscape) or shorter (portrait) than the height (left edge). The flap, and window if present, are always aligned with the top edge. If absent, we'll try to calculate the orientation using the ratio of width to height.

window.title: Window
window.description: Whether this envelope has a window or not. Windows are parallel to the top edge.

href.title: Href
href.description: A URL where the object can be found. Can be either a absolute URL pointing to an external system or a relative URL within the current API scope.

rel.title: Rel
rel.description: Describes the relation type of the link to the object.

rel.title: Rel
rel.description: Describes the relation type of the link to the object.

rel.title: Rel
rel.description: Describes the relation type of the link to the object.

kind.title: Kind
kind.description: The kind of material (or materials) the article is made of

ratio.title: Ratio
ratio.description: The ratio of holes per length, also known as pitch. For example 4:1 means four holes per inch

size.title: Size
size.description: The size of the paper to be bound, in DIN/ISO 216 format. *Note: `size` is required if `kind` is "metal"

number_of_loops.title: Number of loops
number_of_loops.description: The size of the paper to be bound, in DIN/ISO 216 format *Note: `number_of_loops` is required if `kind` is "metal_spool"

system.title: System
system.description: The subcategory of ring binding this belongs to

description.title: Description
description.description: The marketing copy or description of the article

base_unit.title: Base unit
base_unit.description: The base unit in which this article is counted

manufacturer.title: Manufacturer
manufacturer.description: The name of the manufacturer of this article

summary.title: Summary
summary.description: A human-readable summary of the important article attributes. If a language is set using the Accept-Language header, we'll try to translate it to that language, falling back to English.

summary.title: Summary
summary.description: A human-readable summary of the important variant attributes. If a language is set using the Accept-Language header, we'll try to translate it to that language, falling back to English.

global_trade_item_number.title: Global trade item number
global_trade_item_number.description: Global Trade Item Numbers (also known as GTINs) are numbers used to uniquely identify a product. Valid GTINs include EANs (International Article Numbers) and Universal Product Codes (UPCs), and these numbers are usually encoded into barcodes on products. Zaikio supports 8, 12, 13 and 14-digit variants of this number, wrapped in a string.

color.title: Color
color.description: The color of the binding material

diameter.title: Diameter
diameter.description: Diameter of the rings, in millimetres (metric)

diameter_imperial.title: Diameter imperial
diameter_imperial.description: Diameter of the rings in inches (imperial)

surface.title: Surface
surface.description: The surface texture of the envelope

sealing.title: Sealing
sealing.description: The kind of sealing the envelope uses

flap_shape.title: Flap shape
flap_shape.description: The shape of the sealing flap

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the available filter. Filters related to attributes on the final purchasable product.

label.title: Label
label.description: A human-readable label for the filter, translated into your language if possible

total_count.title: Total count
total_count.description: The amount of variants within the result set that have this filter option available.

value.title: Value
value.description: The name of one of the available filter options

label.title: Label
label.description: A human-readable label for the filter value, translated into your language if possible

count.title: Count
count.description: The amount of variants within the result set that have this value for the filter

core_diameter.title: Core diameter
core_diameter.description: Diameter of the core of the roll in dimensions_unit

dimensions_unit.title: Dimensions unit
dimensions_unit.description: The unit used for the measurements of the variant. Defaults to mm

length.title: Length
length.description: The length of the roll in dimensions_unit

width.title: Width
width.description: The width of the roll in dimensions_unit

surface.title: Surface
surface.description: The surface treatment of the sleeking foil

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: Prices & fees are recorded in this currency

references.title: References
references.description: Additional references for the order. By default, Zaikio will include a Zaikio identifier as the first element.

state.title: State
state.description: The current state of the order

accuracy.title: Accuracy
accuracy.description: Procurement will always try to establish the most accurate price based on internal knowledge and queries with the supplier, however these prices can change over time, so we also include accuracy information with them. If `estimated`, the prices are based on basic information previously supplied to us, and will probably change at least once before the order is confirmed. If `in_verification`, we are currently seeking more accurate prices from the supplier, so these prices are currently `estimated` and expected to change shortly. If `verified`, the prices have been recently provided by the supplier and should very closely match the final order price. If `outdated`, the prices are the same as `verified` but should be regarded as quite changeable until the order is confirmed. If `confirmed`, the order has been confirmed by the supplier and the prices will no longer change.

total_net_price.title: Total net price
total_net_price.description: Sum of total_net_price of all order line items (excludes fees & taxes)

taxes.title: Taxes
taxes.description: Taxes applied to the whole order, including those on fees. Will be null until the order is confirmed

total_gross_price.title: Total gross price
total_gross_price.description: Sum of all order line items plus their taxes, plus shipping/handling fees, plus any taxes on those

net_handling_fee.title: Net handling fee
net_handling_fee.description: Sum of handling (i.e. non-shipping) fees. Will be null until verified or confirmed

net_shipping_fee.title: Net shipping fee
net_shipping_fee.description: Sum of shipping fees. Will be null until verified or confirmed

taxes_on_fees.title: Taxes on fees
taxes_on_fees.description: Taxes applies just to the fees on the order. Will be null until the order is confirmed

references.title: References
references.description: Additional references for the order line item. By default, Zaikio will include a Zaikio identifier as the first element.

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: The amount of the given SKU in this line

amount_in_base_unit.title: Amount in base unit
amount_in_base_unit.description: The amount of `base_unit` represented by this line

base_unit.title: Base unit
base_unit.description: The `base_unit` of the Variant used for quantity calculations

order_number.title: Order number
order_number.description: Either the order number associated with the catalog price, or attached to the SKU

description.title: Description
description.description: A human-readable description of this SKU

confirmed_delivery_at.title: Confirmed delivery at
confirmed_delivery_at.description: Confirmed date from the supplier when the item will be delivered

unit_net_price.title: Unit net price
unit_net_price.description: Price for a single SKU in this line. Likely to change until confirmed

total_net_price.title: Total net price
total_net_price.description: Sum of prices for all SKUs in this line, excludes taxes

total_gross_price.title: Total gross price
total_gross_price.description: Sum of prices for all SKUs in this line, includes taxes. Will be null until confirmed

taxes.title: Taxes
taxes.description: Total taxes applied to this line. Will be null until confirmed

tax_rate.title: Tax rate
tax_rate.description: Effective tax rate for this line (e.g. 20% tax would be stored as `0.2`). Will be null until confirmed

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: The amount of units identified by this SKU (see: unit)

amount_in_base_unit.title: Amount in base unit
amount_in_base_unit.description: The amount of units, in the base_unit of this variant

order_number.title: Order number
order_number.description: An order number used to identify this SKU in your system

palletized.title: Palletized
palletized.description: Whether this SKU is large enough to be distributed on a pallet

unit.title: Unit
unit.description: The unit that this SKU is counted in. May differ from the base_unit

environmental_certification.title: Environmental certification
environmental_certification.description: The environmental certification of the material. NOTE: This field only applies to substrate based products

accuracy.title: Accuracy
accuracy.description: Procurement will always attempt to find the best possible delivery date. Once an order has been confirmed, we'll only show the confirmed delivery date, and this value will be `confirmed`. If the value is `in_verification`, `verified` or `outdated`, this date is whatever the supplier has been able to provide. If the value is `estimated`, this is our best estimate of when the delivery might occur, and it may be null.

date.title: Date
date.description: The date that this order will be delivered. See #accuracy for details on how this is calculated.

desired_delivery_date.title: Desired delivery date
desired_delivery_date.description: The date for delivery that was originally requested with the material requirement

references.title: References
references.description: Additional references for the order. By default, Zaikio will include a Zaikio identifier as the first element.

references.title: References
references.description: Additional references for the order. By default, Zaikio will include a Zaikio identifier as the first element.

certifications.title: Certifications
certifications.description: A list of certifications for this particular substrate

classification_reports.title: Classification reports
classification_reports.description: A list of reference reports, which could be related to the certifications

coated.title: Coated
coated.description: Describes the sides on which the paper is coated

finish.title: Finish
finish.description: The type of surface finish of the substrate

kind.title: Kind
kind.description: The kind of the printable substrate

dimensions_unit.title: Dimensions unit
dimensions_unit.description: The unit used for dimensions (width / height) of the variant

height.title: Height
height.description: The height of the plate in the set dimensions unit

orientation.title: Orientation
orientation.description: Orientation of the emulsion side of plates when packaged

thickness.title: Thickness
thickness.description: Thickness of the plate in the set dimensions unit

width.title: Width
width.description: The width of the plate in the set dimensions unit

wrapping.title: Wrapping
wrapping.description: Described how the individual plates are wrapped

burnable.title: Burnable
burnable.description: Whether this plate can be burned-in to extend the number of copies that can be made or not. Will return `null` if unknown

kind.title: Kind
kind.description: The kind of material or materials the plate is made of

maximum_number_of_copies_with_ink.title: Maximum number of copies with ink
maximum_number_of_copies_with_ink.description: The number of copies that can be made with this plate while using ink

maximum_number_of_copies_with_varnish.title: Maximum number of copies with varnish
maximum_number_of_copies_with_varnish.description: The number of copies that can be made with this plate while using UV varnish

supports_uv.title: Supports uv
supports_uv.description: Whether this plate is suitable for usage with UV varnish or not. Will return `null` if unknown

surface_structure.title: Surface structure
surface_structure.description: The type of the required surface structure after exposure

brightness.title: Brightness
brightness.description: The brightness of the substrate as a percentage (values may be >100 for substrates with OBA added)

category.title: Category
category.description: The product category of the substrate

color.title: Color
color.description: The color of the substrates surface

dimensions_unit.title: Dimensions unit
dimensions_unit.description: The unit used for dimensions (width / height) of the variant

form.title: Form
form.description: The form of the printable substrate

grain.title: Grain
grain.description: Grain of the substrate. Please note that we validate width and height dimensions depending on grain: For long grain the width needs to be smaller or equal to the height. For short grain the width needs to be larger or equal to the height.

height.title: Height
height.description: The height of the substrate in the variants dimensions_unit

optical_brightness_agent.title: Optical brightness agent
optical_brightness_agent.description: Flag indicating presence of Optical Brightness Agent (OBA)

optical_brightness_agent_amount.title: Optical brightness agent amount
optical_brightness_agent_amount.description: Amount of the OBA measured in Delta-B (dB)

paper_weight_unit.title: Paper weight unit
paper_weight_unit.description: The unit in which the paper weight is defined

paper_weight.title: Paper weight
paper_weight.description: Paper weight of the substrate specified as grams per square meter (gsm) or lb (basis weight) depending on the paper_weight_unit.

roughness.title: Roughness
roughness.description: The roughness of the substrate in mL/min

thickness.title: Thickness
thickness.description: Thickness of the substrate in micrometer (metric)

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: The transparency of the substrate as a percentage

whiteness.title: Whiteness
whiteness.description: The whiteness of the substrate as a percentage (values may be >100 for substrates with OBA added)

width.title: Width
width.description: The height of the substrate in the variants dimensions_unit

slug.title: Slug
slug.description: Human readable, normalized and unique identifier of the Supplier organization. The slug may be used within Procurement (and other Zaikio Apps) as part of URLs to uniquely identify resources for this organization.

article_types.title: Article types
article_types.description: The types of article that the Supplier intends to offer to everybody, which is displayed to the customer to help them decide whether to connect with the Supplier. Please note that the Supplier may not actually have any articles of these types available to you after connecting, as new article types are added here first before then becoming available in the platform.

brand_color.title: Brand color
brand_color.description: Primary brand colour in hex colour format

logo_url.title: Logo url
logo_url.description: A URL pointing to a SVG, JPG or PNG image of the supplier's logo

pageParam.name: page
pageParam.description: The page of the current collection that shall be returned

perPageParam.name: per_page
perPageParam.description: The maximum number of items included in the response, ie., the page size

updatedOrCreatedSinceParam.name: updated_or_created_since
updatedOrCreatedSinceParam.description: Filters the response for all entities created or updated after the given date

Link.description:
Links to previous and next pages, in the format described in [RFC 8288](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc8288)
The relations `first`, `prev`, `next` and `last` can be present.

Current-Page.description: The current page of the paginated response

Total-Count.description: The total number of items in this collection

Total-Pages.description: The total number of pages for the current page size in this collection

400-BadRequestInvalidPage.description:
Bad Request

This is returned when invalid page or per_page params have been sent.
